Articles.Content:
DOWNLOAD ALL THE MODS!!!

64 bit will open up the mod barrier

share your mod lists!
Mate the update was released like 3hr ago. It's after midnight or late night for most people on this planet. There's not going to be a lot of updated mods.
Mods right now: None. I'm far from a stock purist, and normally use tons of mods, but I'm currently waiting for things to get updated.
MechJeb was pretty quick on the update, I downloaded it a couple hours ago

My plan for this build/save as they are adapted:

Kerbal alarm clock

Kerbal engineer

Kethane

Kerbal attachment system

Extra planetary launch pads

Notes

Remotetech2

Tac life support

Universal storage

Deadly reentry

Mods that will be installed once everything is updated:

All the Realism Overhaul mods

B9

Mechjeb

KER

City Ligts and Clouds

Distant Object Enhancement

Enhanced Navball

Docking Port Alignment Indicator

Procedural parts/wings/fairings

KAS

Infernal Robotics

Probably FusTek station parts and the Near Future stuff, too
How bout we keep all mod-related topics to the mod-related boards and not make a mess for us to clean up, hmm?
